title: The Grounds Guys of Wichita Celebrates Customer Service Excellence with 200+ Google Reviews and 4.8-Star Rating
description: Wichita, KS , Aug. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Grounds Guys of Wichita announces a significant milestone in customer satisfaction, surpassing 200 Google reviews with an outstanding 4.8-star rating. content:
Wichita, KS , Aug. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Grounds Guys of Wichita announces a significant milestone in customer satisfaction, surpassing 200 Google reviews with an outstanding 4.8-star rating. This achievement reflects the company's commitment to excellence in landscaping and outdoor services throughout the greater Wichita area since its founding in 2009.

Baker Family, Owners of The Grounds Guys of Wichita

"Reaching this milestone is truly humbling and represents the incredible dedication of our team and the trust our community has placed in us," said Jeff Baker, owner of The Grounds Guys of Wichita. "I want to thank our hardworking team who brings professionalism and expertise to every project, and our loyal customers throughout Wichita who have supported us for over 15 years. This achievement belongs to all of them."

Since opening in 2009, The Grounds Guys of Wichita has established itself as a premier provider of comprehensive landscaping solutions across Wichita and surrounding communities. The company specializes in lawn sprinkler systems, irrigation installation and repair, sod installation, and , while also offering full-service landscaping, including ongoing maintenance programs and lawn drainage.

"We strive to be the has to offer, and our local team understands that yards can be very different depending on where you live in Wichita," Baker explained. "That's why we cover everything, from to installing complete and surrounding areas. We create customized plans for each homeowner because no two properties are exactly alike."

The Grounds Guys of Wichita distinguishes itself through superior technical expertise and professional credentials. The company employs backflow-certified and licensed irrigation technicians, with the lead technician having received specialized training at Hunter Industries Headquarters in San Marcos, California. The team holds a master irrigator's license for Kansas and maintains a business commercial applicator's license with licensed applicators.

This technical excellence, combined with their comprehensive approach to landscaping in Wichita, has earned The Grounds Guys recognition as a trusted partner for both residential and commercial properties throughout the region.
summary: The Grounds Guys of Wichita, Kansas, has achieved a significant milestone in customer satisfaction, surpassing 200 Google reviews and earning a 4.8-star rating. The company has been a leading provider of landscaping and outdoor services in the greater Wichita area since its founding in 2009. It employs backflow-certified and licensed irrigation technicians, with the lead technician receiving specialized training at Hunter Industries Headquarters in San Marcos, California. This achievement reflects the company's commitment to customer service and commitment to the community.
shortSummary: The Grounds Guys of Wichita surpassed 200 Google reviews with exceptional customer satisfaction, emphasizing their comprehensive landscaping and installation services in the greater Wichita area.

scraped_sources.text:
In the bustling city of Wichita, Kansas, the sight of a green, flourishing business front can capture the admiration of passersby and instill a sense of pride in business owners. The secret to maintaining such an inviting landscape, even under the harsh Kansas sun, is a robust commercial irrigation system. The Grounds Guys of Wichita stand at the forefront of this essential service, offering unparalleled installation and repair services to businesses across Wichita and beyond. Learn more about our commercial irrigation installation and repair services.
Tailored Solutions from the Grounds Guys of Wichita
Recognizing that each lawn is unique, The Grounds Guys of Wichita provide customized irrigation solutions designed to meet the exact requirements of your outdoor space. Whether it’s adjusting to varied water zones or integrating state-of-the-art technology for efficient watering, our experts craft systems that ensure your lawn remains perfectly hydrated without any hassle on your part.
Excellence in Installation
Starting with a detailed assessment of your premises, we propose an irrigation solution that encompasses everything from sustainable water usage and proper drainage to minimizing runoff. We carefully consider the unique aspects of your landscape to design a system that is both efficient and environmentally friendly, ensuring that every drop of water is utilized optimally. Our goal is not only to meet your current needs but also to anticipate future requirements, making our solution scalable and flexible. Our installation process is seamless, aiming to get your system up and running with minimal disruption to your daily operations.
Dependable Repair Services
Despite the high quality of our installations, wear and tear or accidental damage may require repairs. Our team is adept at quickly diagnosing issues and implementing effective repairs to keep your system in top condition. Additionally, we understand the importance of your time and investment, ensuring minimal disruption to your daily operations. With our proactive maintenance approach, we aim to prevent potential issues before they arise, focusing on the longevity of your system. Prompt service and expert knowledge mean your business’s lawn won’t suffer due to downtime.
How The Grounds Guys of Wichita Can Help You
The Grounds Guys is a full-service grounds care company. Our established systems allow us to deliver industry-leading lawn care and landscape solutions to commercial and residential clients. Built on a family tradition of caring, we are driven by a passion to exceed customer expectations and consistently deliver client satisfaction.

The Grounds Guys of Wichita
Choose the right grounds care services team in your area. When it comes to selecting the right team for your commercial or residential lawn care and landscaping services, The Grounds Guys is the right choice.
Services We Provide
Learn More
Join Our Team
The moment you put on a Grounds Guys uniform, you join a close-knit local team and a network of 200+ locations across the U.S. and Canada, which can offer unparalleled career growth and advancement opportunities.
Our franchise owners all share a vision of becoming the employers of choice in the markets they serve by creating a fun, rewarding, and engaging work environment that supports our core values of respect, integrity, and having fun in the process.

argos_summary: The Grounds Guys of Wichita has achieved a significant milestone by surpassing 200 Google reviews with a 4.8-star rating, reflecting their commitment to customer satisfaction in landscaping services since 2009. Owner Jeff Baker attributes this success to the dedication of their team and the trust of the community. The company specializes in customized landscaping solutions, including irrigation installation and maintenance, and is recognized for its technical expertise and professional credentials.
